Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy Reid , with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit. the realignment atop the company's Server and Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
